data.title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
data.caption: Using interviews and rare archival footage, JOHN LEWIS: GOOD TROUBLE chronicles Lewis' 60-plus years of social activism and legislative action on civil rights, voting rights, gun control, health-care reform and immigration.

data.title: Ghosts Of War
data.caption: Five battle-hardened American soldiers are assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II.
